verbose_text: The benzoquinone ansamycin antibiotic geldanamycin (GA), or its derivates, binds to HSP90 by interaction with its ATP binding pocket with much higher affinity than ATP itself [XREF_BIBR], altering the function or folding of proteins that bind to HSP90 (named client proteins), a process that leads unbound proteins to the degradation pathway [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: geldanamycin (GA), or its derivates, binds to HSP90
